thread.section_title: ToursByLocals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ToursByLocals | www.toursbylocals.com
thread.title: David LaFortune

author: David LaFortune
title: David LaFortune
text: Our tour of the Vatican Museums, Sistine Chapel and St. Peter's was made extra special by our very talented and knowledgeable tour guide, Dino Margiotta. Dino's use of both picture's and his tablet provided valuable background information that made our experience truly come alive. I would have missed so much if I had not had Dino's expertise guide us through this magical experience. Thank you Dino for making our tour of the Vatican truly special. I highly recommend Tours By Locals and especially Dino! Dave LaFortune, Hammondsport, Neww York
